DOC.brief_title: A Retrospective Study Evaluating Use Permacol Surgical Implant Repair Abdominal Wall Defects
DOC.criteria: Equal 18 year age Had undergone surgical repair reconstruction abdominal wall defect , ventral hernias incisional hernia use Permacol Surgical Implant .
